name: ZARDENS cd 'BREEDING THE DARK'
description:
Extreme metal in its excellence, Breeding the dark from Belgian warriors ZARDENS delivers 8 venomous songs coming straight from the dark side of the north of Europe.
To all DISSESTION fans that were waiting for a new offering for a long time, ZARDENS came

also for fans of Necrophobic, ...

name: MORDAX cd 'VIOLENCE, FRAUD, TREACHERY'
description:
Thrash/death metal master next generation has a name : MORDAX from Denmark. Influenced by the extreme scene of north of Europe and the Thrash scene, 'Violence, fraud, treachery' is without discussion a masterpiece for each fan of metal in its genre.
The album features the almighty Dan Swan√∂ known for his work with Hail of bullets, dissection, Opeth, ...

For fans of Bloodbath, At the gates, Slayer, ...

name: POWERSTROKE cd 'AWAKEN THE BEAST'
description:
Groovy metal / hxc straight in your face from North of Belgium.
feat. Gay Meskil from Pro-pain and mastered by the almighty Jacob Hansen, 'AWAKEN THE BEAST' goes straight to fans of volbeat, Pro-pain, ...

name: DRAKKAR - X-Rated reloaded
description:
The Speed metal legend is back with their mythic album X-RATED in a Reloeaded version.
This version includes 2 unreleased tracks, new artwork, new mastering of the album.

Buy this piece of metal!!!

name: HATE EMBRACED - The Art of devastation
description:
Germany has really good bands in the extreme metal scene.
Now let introduce you the next big thing in extreme : HATE EMBRACED. Everything is said through this name.
Buy it!!!

name: EVIDENCE - there's only then left
description: Evidence features Diego Reali from DGM. Expect a pure hard fm / heavy metal experience through this killing release.

name: DUST N BRUSH - Filth of our blood
description:
A must from Poland in extreme music.

Every fan of TBDM should have this record!!!

name: DISEASE ILLUSION - Backworld
description:
DISEASE ILLUSION is the next big thing coming from north Italy.
In fact they are the first band that mixes with success Metalcore ( heaven shall burn ) and scandinavian melodic death metal ( Dark tranquility ) with some viking moshy parts ( Amon amarth ).
Support them by bying this record and put them in your country!

name: CARNALITY - carnality
description:
Old school death metal warriors from Italy.

Get this if you're fan of extreme and heavy music.

Death 'til death!

name: ABSURDITY - D:\evolution
description:
For fans of Fear factory and powerfull music that got lazy not to find new stuffs good to hear... ABSURDITY is for you.
Without compromises the french combo put agressivity straight in your face...better than a machine.

Get it!

name: MASTER OF WAHA - Wastelend ( Digipack cd )
description:
The come back of Xavier Carion ( guitarist and composer of Channel zero ) with a new band.
More rock and groovy in some parts but still really intense, this album will make the fans really full of happiness.

For fans of Warrior soul, Alice in chains, Stone sour, ...

name: BURDEN OF FLESH - b.o.f.
description:
Heavy metal has a new name in Belgium : BURDEN OF FLESH.

featuring members of mythic heavy metal band DRAKKAR!

for fans of Iron Maiden, Judas priest, ...

name: BY THE PATIENT - Servants cd
description:
A must for fans of death metal coming from Denmark.

Morbid angel - Cannibal corpse - Vader in one band : BY THE PATIENT!

don't be patient and buy this incredible band!

name: TRUTH CORRODED - Worship the Bled
description:
Thrash / death - extreme metal

for fans of Misery index, Forbidden ,...

The must coming from Australia!

name: DAWN UNDER ECLIPSE - Universus
description:
Absolutely great music for fans of Tool, Opeth, Soilwork, ... 
Dawn under eclipse is highing the music level to the top!

name: A SUBTLE UNDERSTATEMENT - Vestige ( Digi-ep )
description:
The next big thing coming from South France!!!

for fans of The black dalhia murder
Don't miss it !

Ep coming in DIGIPACK!

name: CROCELL - The Wretched Eidola
description:
Danish power  melodical death metal as its best!!

For fans of Illdisposed, Morbid angel, Vader, ...

name: PESTIFER - Age Of Disgrace
description:
Belgian technical Death ensemble PESTIFER unleash their debut full-length album. 

But going on the strength this album, they're gonna be around for a while and bleeding the eardrums of Death Metal hordes over the globe for years to come !

For fans of Death, Atheist, Pestilence and Gorguts.

 
TRACKLISTING :
1. Age of Disgrace
2. Contagious
3. Sleepless Century
4. Forsaken Flesh
5. Tentacles of Damnation
6. Mind Control
7. Betrayal of the Light
8. The Worm
9. Carcinogenic Matter
10. Involution Process
11. The Clue, the Lie and the Death

name: ESSENCE - Lost In Violence
description:
"ESSENCE were formed in 2005 by 4 young musicians. Through their common interest in metal music and with inspiration of bands such as Kreator, Destruction, Exodus, Sodom, ESSENCE started a search to find their own unique sound and style.

The band is now a well known name in the Danish underground with shows in the company of Artilley, Mnemic, Raunchy, Mercenary, Disfear,... and at the Danish metal fest, Metal magic festival, Target‚Äôs next generation of Danish metal, Aalborg metal fest.

In 2007 ESSENCE recorded their self financed Ep called ‚ÄúArt in imperfection‚Äù. It received much critical acclaim and created respect for the abilities and powers which the band possesses and put into their work. In 2010 the quartet enter studio for the recording of their first full cd ‚ÄúLost in violence‚Äù with the algmighty producer Soren Andersen. It gives ESSENCE the opportunity to put their own unique and personal touch to the production.

The band is known for being an extremely well playing live band and will work hard to get fully up from the underground and out on the scenes around in Europe !

For fans of Kreator, DRI, Destruction and Slayer !"

name: NO BRAIN - No Loss Of Grace
description:
NO BRAIN, the answer to all dumb things happening in our world when wrong people are on the top of Hierarchy.

With that kind of talking you easily think that this band is Hardcore.

Formed by members of Stuck up, Astaroth and some other local legends, the five piece combo from Belgium ( Country of Hardcore with bands such Do or die, Deviate, Arkangel ... ) deliver a pure mix of Hardcore ( 2 step and violence ) with some metal influences ( old school ).

After sharing the stage with bands like Do or die, Deviate, Length of time, Angel crew, Arkangel, Kickback, ... NO BRAIN are releasing their first full cd and are ready to consume everyone with their furious music with... no loss of grace... !

For fans of : Sick of it all, Madball, Hatebreed, Terror.

name: ROOTLESS - Dominate The Chaos
description:
from the label : "ROOTLESS stand for a unique mix of many different genres, combined in one emotionally charged packed.

In February 2008 the first Ep ‚ÄúWelcome to the pit‚Äù set new standards for the Austrian metal scene. ROOTLESS also was finally able to establish their self created genre ‚ÄúVienna moshcore‚Äù once and for all.

The combo shared the stage with bands such All shall perish, Born from pain, The sorrow, ...

In July 2010 ROOTLESS recorded their first full length ‚ÄúDominate the chaos‚Äù, including 14 tracks of pure emotion and hard-edged brutality. ROOTLES is going to release his most epic cd by combining melodical Nordic death metal with Hardcore and metalcore influences.

ROOTLESS is only influenced by the shit that surrounds them everyday : Hate, betrayal, rage, pain and the other beautiful emotions this world has to offer.

ROOTLESS is infamous for their action-packed live performances.

For fans of Soilwork, Hatebreed, Parkway drive."

name: THE LAST SHOT OF WAR - The Final Answer
description:
THE LAST SHOT OF WAR is an extreme metal combo created in 2007. After changing and testing several singers, the band chooses 2 singers to be really brutal. The band grows up so fast that their musical evolution gives them to be a real EXTREME METAL band and not only considered as a Beatdown Deathcore band, due to screams and growls coming from beyond the grave and 8-strings dirty guitar riffs. The Last Shot Of War recorded their first full CD at the Blackout Studios with Phorgath (Enthroned) and called it "THE FINAL ANSWER". Expect it loud & brutal !!!

For fans of Devourment, Bury Your Dead, Suicide Silence and Waking the Cadaver !
